channel.title: Green Prosperity || Third Edition
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][SIZE=5]Green Prosperity 3 - Recently had MAJOR updating[/SIZE][/B]
[URL=http://"http://greenprosperity.weebly.com/"]Home[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://greenprosperity.weebly.com/play-now.html"]Play Now[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://greenprosperity.boards.net"]Forums[/URL] ____________________________________
This is a [B]317[/B] loading [B]508/602[/B] models
Green Prosperity 3 is a server developed by Eclipse and Tacos to the players desire. The development team are constantly working on new fun and exciting things to bring to the server, such as Game Chest, Elite Game Chests, Zombie Minigame with an all new Zombie King and much more. We don't only add things that we believe will make things fun, we also add things to the players desire. Which means that if a player wants something, all they have to do is post it on the forums and we'll try our best to add it.
[B]Recent Updates:[/B]
New Rum Runner Minigame New Conquerors Minigame
Revamped Slayer Revamped Mining Revamped Woodcutting
New Client (Loads faster) New Graphics for some things
World Map 100% Clan Chat 100%
Revamped Dungeoneering
New bosses, such as Cedric the Elite, and Damis
New Quests New Achievements 65%
[B]Features:[/B]
Game Tickets with Game Chest Elite Game Tickets with Elite Game Chest
Zombie Minigame Zombie King (New Boss) Zombie Points Shop
100% Curses 100% Ancients 100% Lunar
100% Agility 100% Runecrafting 100% Summoning 100% Slayer 100% Hunting 100% Farming
And a whole lot more!
Donating Benefits:
::egg command with ::noegg ::stone command with ::nostone
Ability to access the donators area. Ability to access the donators only fighting areas. Ability to access donator only shops Ability to use the donators game chest (claws rewarded) Ability to buy Inferno Adze's
And much more!
[b]Staff Team:[/b]
[b]Game Masters[/b] Eclipse Tacos
[b]Staff Captain[/b] Subway
[b]Director[/b] Toxfire ___________________________________
Why not join the community today, and see what all the talks about?
Fishing: [img]http://s11.postimg.org/hsecwhvmr/Fishing.png[/img]
Game Tickets: [img]http://s11.postimg.org/76uhkhpb7/Game_Tickets.png[/img]
Home: [img]http://s30.postimg.org/qio47vtk1/Capture.png[/img]
Hunting: [img]http://s11.postimg.org/w1dzeka5f/Hunting.png[/img]
Skilling: [img]http://s11.postimg.org/g5p5b9jkz/Skilling.png[/img]
Slayer: [img]http://s11.postimg.org/priprkaqr/Slayer.png[/img]
Zombie Minigame [img]http://s8.postimg.org/p505th7yd/zombies.png[/img][/CENTER]
